House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the classification of certain motor fuel and motor fuel blending stock.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to create a new tariff classification to cover imports of motor fuel blending stocks. Imposes a duty on such stocks.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the classification of certain motor fuel and motor fuel blending stock.
